DOC.HEADLINE: EAST VENTURA COUNTY FOCUS : NEWBURY PARK , MOORPARK ; PUBLIC HELP SOUGHT IN SOLVING THEFTS
DOC.TEXT: East Ventura County sheriff ' s detectives are looking_for help from the public to solve several recent thefts , including the theft of a hot-air_balloon from a Newbury Park apartment . Detectives are offering a $ 1 # 000 reward for information that would solve the theft of the balloon , which was packed in a jet-ski trailer in the carport of the apartment complex in the 1800 block of West Hillcrest Drive . Between Jan . 8 and 10 , someone cut the chains locking the multicolored balloon and its basket to the carport , officials said . Detectives also are offering $ 1 # 000 for information leading to the arrest of three bicycle thieves who most recently forced the lock off a blue-green Huffy at 2:30 a.m. Jan . 6 from Spring Road in Moorpark . Both rewards are part of the Sheriff ' s Department ' s Crime Stoppers program . People who call with information may remain anonymous and , if the information leads to an arrest with a criminal complaint filed , the caller will receive the reward . The Crime Stoppers phone_number is 494-TALK . MATTHEW MOSK
